column4: hello I have bought a Logitech QuickCam Deluxe for Notebooks and I while Cheese and Skype recognise it I am not able to adjust it's focusing. As a result I have crystal-clear image of something that is 2cm away from the lenses but awfully blurry when I sit in a normal distance. Can anyone help me to adjust it?
I just googled the camera... found an article on tomsguide.com that says it "only has a manual focus on the right hand side"
